title: Scenarios
content:
Project portfolio scenarios are sets of selections of the proposals that are included in the project portfolios. Scenarios help you understand the business consequences of different selections. You can use manual or automatic optimization to find the best selection of proposals that meets the business goal, while not breaking any resource or budget constraints.

Related topics

  • Project Portfolios
  • How to build and manually optimize a scenario
  • How to optimize a scenario automatically using the embedded optimization engine
  • How to compare scenarios
  • Optimization use case
